question.title: How many MPs will Reform UK have on May 7, 2026?
question.description:
Reform UK is a British political party founded in 2018 as the Brexit Party, renamed in January 2021. The party is led by Nigel Farage, who serves as MP for Clacton.

At the July 2024 general election, Reform UK won 5 seats. Since then, several Conservative MPs have defected:

* Robert Jenrick (Newark) - January 16, 2026
* Andrew Rosindell (Romford) - January 18, 2026
* Suella Braverman (Fareham and Waterlooville) - January 26, 2026

As of late January 2026, Reform UK has 8 MPs in the House of Commons. The party has publicly stated that May 7, 2026 (the date of the upcoming local elections) is the cutoff date for accepting defecting MPs and councillors.

`{"format":"metac_reveal_and_close_in_period","info":{"post_id":42026,"question_id":41768}}`
question.resolution_criteria: This question will resolve as the number of MPs in the British House of Commons who are members of Reform UK on May 7, 2026.
question.fine_print:
This question will primarily resolve based upon official [UK Parliament Records](parliament.uk). If the records are unavailable or found to be unreliable, credible sources may also be used.

If Reform UK changes its name, the new name will still qualify as Reform UK for the purpose of this question.

***
This question's information (resolution criteria, fine print, background info, etc) is synced with an [original identical question](https://www.metaculus.com/questions/42026) which opened on 2026-02-05 05:01:19. This question will resolve based on the resolution criteria and fine print contained above. However, if this question would resolve differently than the original question, then this question will be annulled. Additionally, if the original question's resolution could have been known before this question opened, then this question will be annulled.
